website_summaries.verdict: A solid, comfortable kayaking shoe that does two things particularly well: keeps your foot from moving around within the shoe, and keeps a good grip on whatever surface you're standing on.
pros: Offers a lot of colors and styles, in sizes for both men and women
Upper is a breathable and quick-drying Lycra, while the bottom is a good gripping rubber sole
Holes let out water, but do not let in sand
cons: Some buyers say this option runs a little large
Consider buying down a half size

customer_reviews.title: European Sizing
customer_reviews.text: The shoes themselves seem fine. However, I wish I had known that they came in European Sizing and could have been allowed to select that for myself. My daughter ordered an identical-looking pair under a different brand in a size 10 and received a 41. I ordered a size 10 in this brand and received a 40. They're just a touch too short. I always wear a 41 in European sizes so which I could've chosen that for myself instead of someone randomly converting for me.
customer_reviews.author: Minnemama

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoes EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these shoes! I bought them with the intent of wearing them to a cruise in August but when they arrived I had to try them on. I am typically a flip flop kind of woman but these are so comfortable and soft I am buying more for sure! I love that they are sporty enough to wear to town and cozy enough to wear around the house! Theyre so flexible and breathable that it feels like I'm barefoot!! I prefer these to my tennis shoes and evwn my flip flops! I cant wait to buy more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Conner

customer_reviews.title: My favorite water shoes
customer_reviews.text: We do a lot of kayaking and water activities... I have used these water shoes a handful of times for all day adventures. They are comfortable, dry well (and don’t smell) breathable. I love the color and plan to get more in the future
customer_reviews.author: Quelinda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing water shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an 8 and ordered the "7.5 Medium US Women" and they were perfect, comfortable, soft, with enough grip to walk on rocks and wading through streams. I never felt they could slip off when they were wet and there was still a comfortable amount of space in the toe area to wiggle my feet. I'm 115lbs, 5'4". The only complaint is the stretchy loop used to tighten the shoe is way too long but that can be tucked into the rest of the laces.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie Rose

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, lightweight & rubber reinforcement up around toes 👍
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 5 pairs of these for my husband, our 3 teenage daughters and myself for a last min trip to US Virgin Islands. We wore them everyday for snorkeling for 2.5 weeks and we were very happy with these wet shoes. They’re comfy, light on the feet and easy to slip on/off 👍 The rubber reinforcement up around the toes is an important feature for protection and makes them more versatile for walking on land (on pathway to beach) 😊
customer_reviews.author: Swindell Family

customer_reviews.title: No gravel in my shoes - finally!!
customer_reviews.text: My sons and I like to take our pup hiking and wandering through the creek near our house. Got tired of having stones and gravel and sand in my shoes so I ordered 4 different pairs of water shoes and tried them all. These were the hands down winner. Fit nicely with a snug fit around my lower ankle. The mesh is super closed up so not even sand or dirt sneaks through. The tread is a little thinner than other pairs I tried but works fine for casual hiking like we do. Buying pairs for my kids tonight! 👍🏽👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Leah J. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Seriously awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I'm weird and have very sensitive feet so going without socks bothers me, these make me feel comfortable at all times in the water, I dont have to worry about them slipping off, rocks getting in, or sharp objects jabbing my feet. thick sole protects my feet while still being soft and comfortable on the top portion of my foot. Only downside is the black around the ankles ribs off a bit to after a day at the lake u'll have to wash ur ankles a few times to rid them of black marks
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jo

customer_reviews.title: BLISTERS and SAND
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a shelling trip in Florida, and they're very comfortable. Also easy to take on and off. UPDATE after our trip. Unfortunately, I got blisters on both insteps where the strap was attached. I didn't get sand in mine, but the holes on the bottom of my husbands were in a different place and his filled with sand. An expensive mistake.
customer_reviews.author: A Regular Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fix like a glove
customer_reviews.text: They're super comfortable, will recommend to my friends I bought 7.5 that's my regular size and it's perfect....
customer_reviews.author: Melina

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I actually bought these to use for traveling . Lightweight and very comfortable. I used them during my whole trip walking streets in Europe. These are now my go to casuals instead of my sneakers. Not binding on top of foot or toes. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Terty

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute but too big
customer_reviews.text: Expecting these shoes to run small as suggested from previous reviews, I ordered a whole size larger than I normally wear. BIG mistake - way too big! Even a half size larger would have been too big. I had to return. These are super cute otherwise. I want to order another pair, but not sure of the size. Maybe I will order two pairs and return the one that doesn't fit!
customer_reviews.author: MissAmos

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I received what I expected. Fits great very snug on the foot make sure to get your size and not smaller because you can tighten it! they seem very durable haven’t worn them out yet but feeling confident ! Thank you guys!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works greats for a week on Lake Huron
customer_reviews.text: I usually just use the cheap basic bargain water shoes so they never fit well. But these felt like actual shoes and were also easy to ignore. Very comfortable. Worked well in car, boat, and sand. Also worked well in water that had some rocks and roots (Lake Huron water levels are higher so lots of muck and plants that were previously on shore). A little sand does get into the shoes but I did not find it to be an excessive amount. The only problem I had was the tan (burn) line.
customer_reviews.author: SwayingBacon

customer_reviews.title: Beware the black pair with white trim... size is way off from the others in the series
customer_reviews.text: I love the series of shoes and had three pairs I wear and decided to buy the "new" black ones with white trim. Big mistake. They are much heavier and stiffer AND THE SIZE IS WAY OFF based on previous experience. I wanted a looser pair for special use so I bought the black ones in a full size LARGER than the other three pairs. They aren't even as big as the previous shoes AND they are stiff and the soles are really thick. I would NOT recommend the black and white pair. The others are great.
customer_reviews.author: JMF12345

customer_reviews.title: SO COMFORTABLE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes in the colors black and pink (both 1 and 2) with the intent to use them for my swimming classes at the gym right before the pandemic started. I recently decided to use them for my movement around the house and in my yard. These shoes are so comfortable and provide far better support than my slippery flip flops. I love them! I now have four different pairs. I wanted these to fit my without slippage or too much movement so I sized down from 8.5 to 7.5--Be aware that I have a smaller heel width in relation to my toe bed width.
customer_reviews.author: JRCM

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These water shoes basically fell apart when I tried to pull them on my feet. The tabs in the back pulled off of one of the shoes with little effort. The plastic part that holds the ties together at the end fell off the other shoe thereby making it difficult to keep the shoe pulled close around my foot. that was the first time putting them on. The shoes were inexpensive and now I know why.
customer_reviews.author: Linda lou

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes to protect my feet from the (dead!) coral on the beach during a recent 2-week trip to Tahiti. They worked really well. The mesh cloth upper allowed them to breathe, but kept out most of the sand. The soles are slightly flexible, so I could feel that I was walking on the sharp objects, but it wasn’t painful. They’ve held up much better than other brands that I’ve tried in the past. They smelled terrible when new, but after a single use in saltwater, the smell was gone. I ordered a half a size smaller than my typical shoe size, and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Emanon

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: After one days of use in the water the seems on both shoes have started to come off from the toes of the shoes. Clearly a quality issue given that it happened on both shoes and with minimal usage swimming in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my son for a vacation to a lake where the beaches are half sand, half rocks, and too painful for bare feet. My son really likes the shoes. They are easy to get on and off (even when wet) and very comfy. The insole is removable to facilitate faster drying and sand removal. The bottoms are thin and flexible, so you can definitely feel the ground beneath them, but they're thick enough to protect tender feet from rocks & sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Way to small!
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to fit my size 12 feet. These would not fit on a 12 year old girl:( Also the part that is supposed to go on string to tighten laces had already fallen off one of the shoes in the bag. If they had fit I would have liked to keep them. They look great and are very light.
customer_reviews.author: Michael  Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as my first pair
customer_reviews.text: Does the second pair I have bought from this company. The first pair were amazing they lasted over a year. Eventually there was a hole on the top by my big toe. These have had about one month of regular use and both souls have come away from the toe webbing. I pretty much only use them to walk around in wet grass alongside the lake, very little use in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Kiddo loved them and wore them day 1. Seem very true to size. I noticed the insoles don't seem to stick real well. After one wear, they're lifting. Doesn't seem like they're glued down, so this might be by design. I don't like it and don't want to deal with them moving around while walking so that's why only 3 stars. Otherwise, they're good and also have a good instep/arch, so can be worn all day comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Christa Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Shoelace broke
customer_reviews.text: I received my first pair and immediately the shoe lace broke. I returned them for a new pair. I really was happy with Amazon’s customer service since they shipped out a new pair before receiving the old pair. When I got the new pair I made sure to be careful with the shoe lace. No problems. However when I was in El Salvador the new pair the shoelace broke. I was stuck there was nothing I could do. I had to fix them so I wouldn’t get burned on the beach. Not sure about them now.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Grewe

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for lake swimming!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 13 year old grandson to wear at the lake. They fit as expected and he loves them! He mentioned that he was concerned that they would not be comfortable on the rocks but he said that they are fine..the bottoms are just thick enough to be comfortable. He says they are snug enough around the tops that nothing gets inside. He wears them from rocky road to in the lake to in the boat...buy them! They probably won't last longer than one summer because they aren't meant to wear so much, but he'll outgrow them anyway. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: tdmchris

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, over priced for what they are.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way they looked but outdoor stores have a better quality product for the same money. I was disappointed in the quality of these especially with the somewhat inflated price. These are basically the cheap brand from your local WM with a shoe string stitched on the front. Before buying these see what your local outdoor store has available for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: They tend to run small. I should have ordered a 9 . I'm usually 8.5. Now, these shoes are so comfortable! I purchased them for boat and lake shoes but I wear them everyday. The soles tend to come out when you take them off but that doesn't bother me. I purchased the bright yellow and will be back for more. One thing is the shipping was longer than expected but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: always hopeful2

customer_reviews.title: Order your actual shoe size--don't size down
customer_reviews.text: I consistently wear a size 9 shoe, but ordered a size 8.5 in this because of reviews and also because my past experience with other water shoes has been that the ocean sucks them off my feet if they are even slightly loose. However, the 8.5 in this shoe was not bearable--my toes were rolled up. I had to send them back and order a size 9, which is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: Even better than what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying for years to replace a pair that I bought at the shore and probably have a dozen pairs of water shoes that are just "not quite". THESE ARE BETTER than the ones I've been searching for. The strap let me adjust each shoe to that foot so that the fit is perfect. AND the way they "breathe" so that they not only dry fast, but don't allow sweat to build up inside is just awesome. Love these so much that I ordered another pair to replace my house slippers. Can't remember ever having a more comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: A. Heffner

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, decent product
customer_reviews.text: I like the act there is grip on river rocks when crossing a stream or narrow, shallow river. I use water shoes for all my obstacle course racing because when I exit the muddy, water obstacles I'm already draining the water while others have their shoes weighed down. These shoes helped a lot, gave my toes protection and the somewhat thick rubber sole helped in as-far-as not feeling the sharp rocks as much under my feet. They're good to go running in and have good traction on the trails. So far so good, I'll update on the longevity of these shoes when they've been through more damage. Ha
customer_reviews.author: mia

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Comfortable Water Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, stylish water shoes for the price! I wanted a pair with Velcro instead of strings and this fit the bill. Speaking of fit, I ordered a mens size 9 and they were a perfect fit. Lighter than expected but very comfortable and dry quickly. I bought them for exercising in the pool because the pool was giving me blisters. These protect my feet and have great grip! Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: kjm8888

customer_reviews.title: Great yard working shoes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes for working in the yard. We live on a hill and I need something that grips and is stable. These fit the bill. And they are very light weight which is nice in the extreme heat we get here. My only complaint is that the insoles come out.....my preference would be that they were not removable. I'll probably order a second pair.....they are great for my need.
customer_reviews.author: moniquz

customer_reviews.title: Fits men's size 13 foot
customer_reviews.text: Only water shoes of this style I've found that fits my dad. He wears a 13D and while they are tight, they fit great. The tightness just means they stay on securely while swimming. He loves them. They are like going barefoot except they have a sturdy sole that allows him to do water aerobics without tearing up his feet.
customer_reviews.author: Tripping Wisteria

customer_reviews.title: Great for rocky waters!
customer_reviews.text: Here in Florida we can have some rocky shores, I cut my feet up pretty bad on a murky beach hiding oyster shells and had to shove us off - which was the reason we bought these. They work great and protect my feet in busy areas where people tend to throw over bottle caps and even glass, now there’s no worries of having foot injuries.
customer_reviews.author: fleet56

customer_reviews.title: Very Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is OK for use indoors or around a pool or on a sandy beach, but forget about hiking or walking on a rocky shore. You can feel every pebble right thru the sloe.
customer_reviews.author: AJK

customer_reviews.title: Good support, great alternative to going barefoot
customer_reviews.text: Roomy toe box. Good arch support. I cannot walk barefoot due to needing orthotics in shoes. I needed something “like slippers” to walk around the house. Once I got them- I started wearing them outside too. They are great for walking around the concrete of the pool. I also wear them in the public shower. Time to get another pair to wear around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a sailing trip to the BVI. They were perfect for jumping on and off the boat to dinghy or dock, walking along trails or shorelines that ranged from sandy to wet to muddy, and often rocky. They provided the protection I needed. They were also fine walking around the towns. They ended up being the only shoes I needed and I got several complements on them! I even wore them on the plane on the way home. They did not take up any significant space in my luggage either. I will make sure everyone I travel with on a sailing trip in the future has a pair!
customer_reviews.author: Kyarbo

customer_reviews.title: Great little water shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what I wanted. Just a little cover to go vacation beaches where I wasn't sure if it was rocky, or shell-y. I could walk on sidewalk great and these fit in my regular fins for snorkeling as well. They are very small, dry fast and do exactly as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall - Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and feel. They look good too. In fact, there's only one minor thing wrong: there's a rubber tab where your foot slips in (I guess as a grip to pull them on). It digs into my foot. Not that big a deal since I simply cut it off and solved the problem, but why had they not already noticed?
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased thus far!
customer_reviews.text: Best beach, creek and pool shoes that I’ve ever purchased. Unsure about the durability yet, as I’ve only had them a short time but so far, outstanding. If you sink in sand/mud, as long as you had the dongle drawn snug, they don’t slide off your feet. Easy to wash up and quick to air dry. I’d recommend them at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: not great quality
customer_reviews.text: I wore these shoes once, they stayed wet all day after initially walking through some water and the insides fell out when I took them off the first day. I didn't want to spend the money on expensive 5finger shoes but I see now that you get what you pay for. I will not be wearing these again.
customer_reviews.author: colette fardella

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: happy with these water shoes. like to wear these around town and they seem fairly well made but kind of concerned how much wear they can take. make sure to keep toe nails short so i dont poke a hole in front. some of the other shoes that were slightly more expensive had reinforced rubber to keep this from happening but they were also $35+ and wasnt easy to find the correct size so well see how they hold up
customer_reviews.author: Tanon larson

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, cool, brandless
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfy! I got the olive green ones with orange details and I like the fact that these don't have ANY branding or words on them. Also I didn't think I'd like the multicolored soles as much as I do but they're great. Looking forward to jumping into the river this summer in these babies!
customer_reviews.author: Coy

customer_reviews.title: Buy these for boating!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy a pair of shoes to go kayaking. They work PERFECTLY!! The water drains quickly when you lift your feet out of the water. Really nice grip to walk around on whatever surfaces. I would buy these again. AND, I have recommended them to others already.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Love, love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I boat a ton so I go through water shoes like crazy. Most of the ones I've tried, while trying not to spend an arm and a leg, are stiff and uncomfortable. This pair is the best ever! The fit is great, snug but not too tight. They don't feel like they're going to fall off once I'm in the water. Extremely comfortable and really cute too. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Cool technology for pool water aerobics
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these shoes. The toes are different bright colors with the black rubber sole which make them really attractive. I find that my balance is better while wearing these shoes in the pool for water aerobics, there is no slipping only a good grip for the bottom of the pool. The fit is just right, I ordered my usual shoe size. The toe box is roomy with a little support for the arch.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Seiler

customer_reviews.title: These must run a little bigger than US sizes
customer_reviews.text: I requested an 8.5/9 in US sizing and it feels like a 10, I have a lot of room in the front of my toes. I will deal with it they are good quality and comfortable, I bought them for their breathability and protection from rocks under foot while launching/bringing in my Kayak at the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Jason McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy soles. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I swim nearly every day. If I don’t have on fins I’m wearing these shoes. They have a sturdier sole than other pairs I have worn out. The top stretches a bit so they are easy to put on and take off. They float. If you swim a lot these sores really save the soles of your feet!
customer_reviews.author: counselorjack

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE SHOES
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are as advertised! Amazing. Water shoes need to fit snug so the first ones I bought for me (this pair) ended up being my husbands. He's a men's size 8W. The wider toe box made such a comfortable fit! Feet stay drier in these shoes and the soft grip to the foot coupled with the surface grip was GREAT! They washed easy and did not retain the "ocean" smell like others we have owned.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: There really comfortable I find myself using them as slipers walking around the house and outside. I just got them so I will see how long they last. The only thing is so far they have no grip when on smooth wet surfaces. You find it to be really slippery so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Mayorquin

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kayaking
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to use for a 3 day fishing/kayaking trip. I normally take Keens but I found that when they get over exposed to water, they tend to blister my toes. These shoes were insanely comfortable. I talked my two friends into getting a pair and they both agreed they were very comfortable. They held up on the rocks and rapids with very minor damage. I would highly recommend these shoes for anyone that spends time on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fit, colors and comfort! They are so comfortable I’m actually wearing them around the house as slippers. They are lightweight, yet they have the rubber soul on the bottom. Good cushion inside also. I am ordering a second pair because I love these so much!
customer_reviews.author: Pixeechant

customer_reviews.title: Great for kayaking arrived with ants :(
customer_reviews.text: For July 4th of 2020 I wore them kayaking and walked around northern Michigan. I actually love them. They’re comfy, the sole is thick enough to not feel rocks, but they’re pretty loose on my narrow feet. My only complaint is that they took a really long time to arrive and when they did, they were full of ants. They had burrowed their way into (or out of) the inner bag and crawled on me before I even opened the bag. They were also in the bag. It was horrifying.
customer_reviews.author: saryn

customer_reviews.title: Women Size 8, I purchased a men size 6/7.5 women
customer_reviews.text: Great water shoes, I have had them for over a year. I have received many compliments. I took these to Cancun and water parks. Sadly, one of the securing tabs that hold the laces fell off but I tied the ends and it works fine. I walk around in them, it’s comfortable. They don’t feel heavy or get filled with water and drag.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed so far.
customer_reviews.text: Have really liked these shoes so far. They are really comfortable and before I used them Kayaking I found myself wearing them around the house. Have used for Kayaking three times now and they work great for that purpose. I don’t think I would want to walk long distances in these on uneven surfaces but on level surfaces they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sam B.

customer_reviews.title: comfy, beachy wear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my family to use on our vacation in Hawaii, where there are a lot of rocks on the beach and waterfall hikes. They informed me that these shoes were comfortable and fit well. No complaints heard throughout the trip about wearing them. I can't be sure about durability because it was a short vacation but will update later on if we get the chance to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: STARVINGSTUDENT

customer_reviews.title: Kayak shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes, I bought a pair and then within a week, bought another pair, very comfortable for kayaking or just wearing around the house. The size is perfect, and they look like they will last a long time. I am happy with these shoes and would recommend them to other kayakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am an 11.5, ordered a 12 and they fit almost perfect (tiny bit big). I gotta say I tried them on immediately and I never took them off until bedtime, so comfortable, light and breath well. I think I can unload my slippers and use these to knock around in.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: great for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Hit the beach couple times a year. In the past found that I had a choice between wearing flip-flops or Clogs and living with the sand in shoes, or frying the arches without! These water shoes made my day! No sand, no fried arches, no cuts-pokes-jabs from junk on the beach! They're strechee so easy on/off. Yea....happy!
customer_reviews.author: RwS

customer_reviews.title: I bought these shoes for vacation and they were fantastic! I wear a 9
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for vacation and they were fantastic! I wear a 9.5 shoe size but with water shoes, you want them fitted and gotten a 9 and it fit like a glove. Go down a half size The shoes were pretty durable and lasted through walking around the beach and concrete, and through the the ocean Kept my feet happy from the rocks, they are comfy where I didn't have to take them off like some other shoes. They stay on the majority of the time without adjustments. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these water shoes. I use them when exercising in the pool. Very comfortable and fit well. Ordered a size 9 which is my normal shoe size and they fit perfectly. Have not used for outdoor use yet. Not sure how they would hold up for outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: DEJ-WI

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure about these when I purchased because my shoe size is between a 7 and 7.5 depending on manufacturer. All in all, everything from quality and style is great except the fact that the velcro doesn't quite line up, which is why I deducted 1 star. It's minor, but it's annoying when part of it (about a third) is off and the only way it can line up is if that part of the shoe is deformed. Other than that, it would have been perfect, but I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: AskVivian

customer_reviews.title: Best water shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: This is super comfortable i was pleaseantly surprised! I got a size 36 and my regular sneaker size is 6.5 to a 7 and my dress shoe size is a 5 to 5.5. I'll admit there isn't too much support on the bottom so you may feel rocks while walking but seriously the most comfortable water shoe ever! Not too tight, not too loose, has adjustable straps and most importantly it doesn't have itchy material inside like other water shoes. Also they look like a sneaker so they go well with most outfits
customer_reviews.author: kkll

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but this one deserved one. The tab on the back that you pull on to slip your foot on ripped off on the first use with hardly any pull.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: True to size. I'm an 8.5 US, upon opening they appear to be small, but once I got them on it's a perfect fit, so lightweight, breathable, and comfortable!!!!! Anti-skid for sure, going kayaking and I cant wait to use them!
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and how they fit. I purchased a size 9 as I am an 8 1/2 in shoe size. Of course there is stretch to them . Easy on and off. Using them for paddle boarding and where I go its muddy and rocky to get into the water and they are super comfortable that I don't take them off to paddle board. Already wore them 3 times and so far easy clean up and dry quickly. Hoping they last a couple seasons. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Musto

customer_reviews.title: Best Surf Shoe I've Ever Purchased
customer_reviews.text: These surf shoes were fantastic. Bought a pair for myself and my husband for a recent trip to the Bahamas and they were fantastic for walking on roads, beaches, volcanic rock and coral. Wore them swimming and snorkeling. They were light and easy to clean, dried fast. Would totally buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TinaS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, adjustable, and very practical!
customer_reviews.text: These are my first real pair of water shoes, and after slipping them on the first time all I can say is they feel super comfortable and they look just like the photos! They have an adjustable pulley so you can tighten or loosen as you need, and looks like plenty of drainage holes on the bottom. Very vibrant colours on the shoe and feels like good sturdy quality for a few seasons at least!
customer_reviews.author: Nicola Harris

customer_reviews.title: If you have small ankles, keep on shopping
customer_reviews.text: I really like the build of this water shoe, but I have very small ankles and the velcro doesn't stretch enough to tighten for me like I would like them to tighten. I am pretty vigorous in the water for my water aerobics class, so these may not be my best choice. They are fine for lounging or playing in the water, though.
customer_reviews.author: JJW

customer_reviews.title: Strap doesn’t reach to secure shoe on your foot. Strap to short.
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy up a size because of the width of shoe. The strap did not reach across the shoe to Velcro. These shoes do fit wide in the toe area, which makes them very comfortable. I would rate these shoes higher if they didn’t come with an awkward strap that cannot be used. I Had to pay a professional seamstress to remove the strap and Velcro. They dry fast and are comfortable otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes! They fit so perfectly right away and didn't need any break-in time! Even though I bought them to be "water shoes" I walk my dog around the park with these and run errands in these too since they feel like minimal gym shoes. Probably ok for small pebbles or dirt paths, but not a lot of support or protection for sharp rocks. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: khaupt

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn these in the water just yet, but I have tried them on and walked around the house in them. They are way more comfortable than I expected. They fit nice and snug on my feet and they fit comfortably. Can't wait to actually try them in the water either kayaking or on our upcoming beach vacation.
customer_reviews.author: KTF

customer_reviews.title: Amazing water/mud shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes for a trip to Hawaii where I knew I would be doing a bit of muddy hikes and snorkeling. They worked perfectly! I loved the grip on the rocky coasts and how easy they were to wash out the mud/sand. Bonus: dried very quickly. I do suggest wearing socks when not in the water (I wore the no-show ones) since they are a bit abrasive inside. I would purchase these again no problem though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly-Anne

customer_reviews.title: This water shoe drains water and any sand that may have gotten in.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical that the shoe would keep sand out. After trying them at the lake and on a sandy boat ramp, I am sold this is a fantastic shoe. I would have ordered a half size up but other than that, they are great!!
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.text: I bought a matching pair for me and honey to take on a beach vacay. He liked his and so did I. they are comfortable and a little slip resistant too. we enjoyed. perfect for the beach and keeping nasties off of your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Renee McLaurine

customer_reviews.title: This is the best beach shoe!
customer_reviews.text: What a great beach shoe. I ordered a 9 and a 10 since I usually wear a 9 1/2 and there are no half sizes. Both fit well but the 9 fit a little more snug to my foot, which I wanted in the water. There are many holes in the rubber sole of the shoe so water can drain out which made the shoes comfortable and very functional. I will wear these from now on. My husband bought a pair and also thought the shoes were great! We both wore them for a week and had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes thus far, but took 4 weeks to ship from China
customer_reviews.text: So I love the shoes thus far. They fit perfectly, keep rocks and most sand out comparatively well, protect my feet decently for being so lightweight and flexible. I've used them about 6 times and they held up well. Since I really liked them, I ordered a second pair for my fiance. The first order arrived quickly as expected for Prime 2 day shipping. The second pair for my fiance took about a month to arrive from China. No idea why the stiffens as both were Prime 2 day shipping, but summer is now over, and we're rather annoyed by the long wait. False to advertise this as Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Beatnic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and comfortable !
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, i bought them for kayaking but i also wear them around yard as well. They are very comfortable, and actually look great with jeans ! For water use, they drain well and dry quickly, the soles seem to grip very well, and they are still very light when wet. a great pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: NoNameTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits just fine. I took them on a cruise and used them way more than I thought. Excellent walking along the beach, horse back riding on some trails, and kayaking. I would remove the inner liner and rinse them off well after each activity and they were ready to go again within a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: DLJ

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a trip to Saint Lucia. Kept the sand out. Worked great for snorkeling
customer_reviews.author: ZRB

customer_reviews.title: These shoes saved my feet!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes they are great for climbing rocks to jump off cliffs. They do not let sand or rocks in because of the tightness around the foot, which I really appreciate. I wear them all day and they are great on the paddle board.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for over a year. Used in the ocean on the beach and at out lake cabin in the sand/muck. Very comfortable and easy to put on. Remain snug while swimming so as they don't fall off. I have wide feet and they fit great. There is zero arch support but the foot pad is comfortable. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: bignoise

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Useful when I do warm water therapy. It helps me walk on slippery pool floors and protects my feet on rough surfaces. It is comfortable and quick, easy to put on
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these (husband & I) for vacation that included a lot of water stuff, beach, pool, sand etc. these were great for that, they protected our feet and they are attractive, everywhere we went we were asked where we purchased them! They are well made and serve their purpose, I recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Francesca G.

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoe
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about this water shoe. They were just a hair more expensive than a typical water shoe, but they're really nice. The only downside is that when I am on my paddle board, if I sit down on my legs and sit back on my heals, the string clasp on the top of the shoe is uncomfortable. It digs into the top of my foot. Otherwise a great quality water shoe.
customer_reviews.author: New Mexico Walker

customer_reviews.title: Go one size small
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pairs - size 43 and 44. The 43 felt too small when I first got them, so I wore the 44. However, when they get wet, they do "grow" in size. Tried the 43 the next time and they were great (I wear a 10.5 men's shoe.) So, yes, they do run slightly large, so size down. Otherwise, I love the heck out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Idahobaker

customer_reviews.title: Cute...but a little big
customer_reviews.text: I am a US size 8-9, I got size 39 and they are too big. I am not sure if you want them big or not? I haven’t really worn them in the water yet, however, they do feel good to wear around the house. I really like the fabric holding your foot in place and the adjustable strap with velcro. Plus they are very cute and love the colors on the bottom of sole...that is so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself (female) and another version that slips on with no cincher for the kiddos. Prefer mine for sure. They kept getting little rocks in their shoes. So cincher was crucial for walking in rivers etc while canoeing.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Fit a little too loose. I have a wider foot so I got a half size larger. I could have just got my normal size. They look awesome and have more cushion at the sole than I thought. We used these for our cruise and our excursions and they were great to walk in!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Both feet on the gas!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for distance cycling They feel like socks. They fit perfectly and are comfortable, lightweight, breathable and stylish. Both feet on the gas! : )
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Best & most comfy water shoes!
customer_reviews.text: The best water shoes! Great fit, quick drying, great ground grip. True protection from sand by rubber sole going up around all sides of shoe. I’m a 7 women’s & went down a size to 5 Women for these shoes & they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tia 888

customer_reviews.title: Great beach shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Comfortable. Didn't keep the sand completely out but it helped.
customer_reviews.author: LJUAN HALE

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and fabulous function!
customer_reviews.text: I appreciated the color and design of these water shoes. They are padded and comfortable. Water indeed drains out of the bottoms of the shoes, which makes them easy to walk in the water. I did not have any issues of the shoes loosening and coming off either. I only used them 4 times, quality so far, great!
customer_reviews.author: SummerDays

customer_reviews.title: great for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Bought these last minute before a beach vacation. Was not sure they would have enough of a sole to make walking comfortable on the asphalt and any pebbles, but they were very comfortable. They fit great and were very easy to get on/off, even when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome zero drop, wide toe box shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome! Zero-drop, wide toe box, and comfortable. And cheap. Great for workouts or just walking around. Getting a second pair now. Tie them loosely and just step in and out. I removed the removable insole.
customer_reviews.author: Just a guy and his family

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a trip to Atlantis in the Bahamas to wear in the waterpark. I thought they fit nice and held up well. They stayed on my feet and did not give any blister.
customer_reviews.author: Jspin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I live in the water during the summer lakes, rivers, fishing ponds I wear them everywhere great product I’ve hiked in them as well and they held up really well
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Cute water shor
customer_reviews.text: Looks cute. I use as a kayak shoe and lake shoe. Makes walking on mucky bottoms bearable. Rinses off easily and easy on and off.
customer_reviews.author: RobinWS

customer_reviews.title: Price point is great
customer_reviews.text: Great watershoe, taking on a trip to Costa Rica and I will update when I get back. They are light and flexible and comfortable while I walked around house with them on! Wore them in Costa Rica at waterfalls, no problem, pretty good grip, would buy again..
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, fit well, attractive, do the job!
customer_reviews.text: Using primarily for pool use. Haven't had occasion on the beach but have worn walking through stores and at home inside and outside and feel very comfortable. Size was true to my usual shoe size. Having the drawstring feature helps make it easier to put on and then snug up to keep them on. Dries quickly. Using in a chlorine pool, I soak them well in regular water when done to hopefully increase longevity.
customer_reviews.author: CBP

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a 8.5, but I was reading the comments about the size being slightly larger. I decided to stick with 8.5. It fits well the comments are right; if you feel comfortable with going down a half or full size go for it. I personally didn't mind having a tad bit of wiggle room. Better to be a little big than too tight.
customer_reviews.author: darby coria

product_meta.title: PENGCHENG Mens Womens Water Sports Shoes Quick-Dry Lightweight Barefoot Wide Feet Toe Solid Drainage Sole for Swim Diving Surf Aqua Pool Beach Jogging Trip
feature_bullets: 1. Color and Style -- The color and design of these water shoes is easy to all-match. They are padded and comfortable. There are various designs for you to choose from PENGCHENG water shoes.
2. Sturdy Safe Bottom -- They provide decent traction and protect feet from scrapes.The jogging shoes are perfect and they make walking on the hot sand wonderful.

3. Durable and Flexible -- The barefoot shoes drain sand and water well, which makes them easy to walk in the water. you don't worry the shoes loosening and coming off either. Walking on sand, concrete and under water with no issues.
4. Quick-Drying -- The uppers are made by quick drying lycra material, comfortable, soft, natural breathable, full texture, quick-drying.

5. OCCASION --- Multi-functional water shoes for snorkeling, swimming, diving, surfing, jogging, yoga training, kayaking, driving, walking, fishing, cycling, kayaking, windsurfing, weight training, sailing, parasailing, boating, cycling, pool, yoga, pilates, beach volleyball, garden, and so on.
